items.title: All Steps | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for Microsoft 365 Connector. Sequence connector for Microsoft Graph API. Easily import and export data from Microsoft 365 applications when automating forensic and ediscovery workflows.

items.title: M365ChannelMessagesRead Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Reads M365 Channels. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365ChannelsRead Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Reads M365 Channels. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365ChatsRead Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Read User mail from Microsoft 365. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365GetToken Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Gets the M365 Token that was used to login.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365Login Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Login to M365. You do not need to do this.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365MailRead Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Read User mail from Microsoft 365. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365TeamsRead Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Read a list of users from Microsoft 365. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: M365UsersRead Step | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
items.description: Read a list of users from Microsoft 365. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.
